query:
SELECT 
  c.id as cycleId,
  c.title as cycleTitle,
  w.weekGroup,
  COUNT(DISTINCT co.id) as totalContents,
  SUM(CASE WHEN co.isAccessible = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as accessibleContents,
  SUM(CASE WHEN co.isAccessible = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as blockedContents
FROM cycles c
JOIN weeks w ON w.cycleId = c.id
LEFT JOIN contents co ON co.weekId = w.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, w.weekGroup
ORDER BY c.id, w.weekGroup;

  c.id as cycleId,
  c.title as cycleTitle,
  w.weekGroup,
  COUNT(DISTINCT co.id) as totalContents,
  SUM(CASE WHEN co.isAccessible = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as accessibleContents,
  SUM(CASE WHEN co.isAccessible = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as blockedContents
FROM cycles c
JOIN weeks w ON w.cycleId = c.id
LEFT JOIN contents co ON co.weekId = w.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, w.weekGroup
ORDER BY c.id, w.weekGroup;
